item.title: Str bonus help . me plz
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Go to your item.cfg, Find the item you want to edit, go to the very end of that item, and the 2nd Number from the end, Change that.

Edit: glabay beat me to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Str bonus help . me plz
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

go into your config folder and lok for item.cfg then look for you item and the last 12 numbers affter the name are you bounes just change them

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------||---------ATTACK BOUNES----------------||---------DEFENCE BOUNES----------------||--OTHER BOUNES--
//----- id ------ name ---------------- decription -------------------price1---price2--price3--stb--- slash --crush---mage---range-||-stab -- slash --crush--- mage---range-||-str --- magehit
item = 14514	3rd age kite		kite from the 3rd ages		100	100	0	0	0	0	0	0	55	55	55	-100	80	0	0

thast an example
